Package com.masri.TaskMangamentSystem.service.impl

Class ProjectService

java.lang.Object
com.masri.TaskMangamentSystem.service.ProjectService
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServiceInterface<Project>
@Service public class ProjectService extends Object implements ServiceInterface<Project>
Service class for managing projects and their associated tasks.

    • addTaskToProjectById

      public void addTaskToProjectById(int id, Task task) throws ProjectNotFoundExecption, TaskNotExistExecption, DuplicateTaskExecption
      Adds a task to a project by project ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the project.
      task - The task to be added.
      Throws:
      ProjectNotFoundExecption - If the project with the given ID does not exist.
      TaskNotExistExecption - If the task does not exist.
      DuplicateTaskExecption - If the task already exists in the project.

    • updateProjectTaskPriorityById

      public void updateProjectTaskPriorityById(int projectId, int taskId, Priority priority) throws ProjectNotFoundExecption, ProjectNotContainsTaskException
      Updates the priority of a task in a project by project ID and task ID.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project.
      taskId - The ID of the task.
      priority - The new priority of the task.
      Throws:
      ProjectNotFoundExecption - If the project with the given ID does not exist.
      ProjectNotContainsTaskException - If the project does not contain the task with the given ID.

    • updateProjectTaskStatusById

      taskId - The ID of the task.

      Throws:
      ProjectNotFoundExecption - If the project with the given ID does not exist.

    • countTasksByStatus

      public Long countTasksByStatus(int projectId, Status status) throws ProjectNotFoundExecption, ProjectNotContainsTaskException
      Counts the tasks by their status in a project by project ID.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project.
      status - The status of the tasks to be counted.
      Returns:
      The count of tasks with the specified status.
      Throws:
      ProjectNotFoundExecption - If the project with the given ID does not exist.
      ProjectNotContainsTaskException - If the project does not contain any tasks.

    • countTasksStatus

      public Map<Status,Long> countTasksStatus(int projectId) throws ProjectNotFoundExecption, ProjectNotContainsTaskException
      Counts the tasks by their status in a project by project ID.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project.
      Returns:
      A map of status to the count of tasks with that status.
      Throws:
      ProjectNotFoundExecption - If the project with the given ID does not exist.
      ProjectNotContainsTaskException - If the project does not contain any tasks.
